name: Match-Maker Ventures
membership: Match-Maker Ventures is not a member of any associations or such
memberOrga: No organizations are members of Match-Maker Ventures
goal:
Match-Maker Ventures (MMV) aims at accelerating innovation by fundamentally changing the way how startups and corporates work together to unlock hidden value and to create long-term real economic impact to EU.

The mission of MMV is to connect leading-edge startups to 500 million customers in Europe through cooperation with corporates, maximising opportunities and creating immediate impact for both corporations and startups.
euInitiatives: We follow the developments of Startup Europe Activities under the Digital Single Market.
